title: Bitsumishi Pro in Arabic, Chinesse,...???
content:
Hi, I am looking for fonts similar to Bitsumishi Pro, [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/bitsumishi-pro/regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116123802/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/bitsumishi-pro/regular/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/bitsumishi-pro/regular/") in different languages (Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Japanese and Russian.

Thank you for your help.
author: pxs1979
